ygData.subject: Re: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, only way I can think of is running with SoW or Accelerando while charming two to fight each other.  I avoid doing that because (lately) it s so
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 13 Oct 1999 Valharick@... wrote:
> kim@... writes:
>
> << Hmm, I don't recall hill giants starting to /con anything but
> yellow or red until I was level 35. Cyclopses were blue at 30
> though (at least most of them). >>
>
> And? :) I killed 4 hg's today realatively quickly (didnt time this one, was
> too busy tryin not to die). And yes they were all red. As I said be
> creative!! Bards are an extremely strong class is played right. Anyways,
> think about it, if ya can't figure out how I do this, l'll let my secret out
> :)

Hmm, only way I can think of is running with SoW or
Accelerando while charming two to fight each other. I avoid
doing that because (lately) it's so difficult to find one
giant much less two, and they're likely to kill a lot of
people as you run around trying to get charm to stick. I
suppose North and West Karana is broad and unpopulated enough
to do this reasonably safely.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
